analyzed: sku mdog dmar mo padma dmar po 'dab ma brgyad pa dang nyi ma la rdo rje skyil krung gis @218b bzhugs shing /

original: g-yas pa'i phyag lhag ma rnams kyis ni lcags kyu dang / rna ba'i drung du bkang ba'i mda' dang / mchog sbyin pa'i phyag rgya mdzad pa /
analyzed: g-yas pa'i phyag lhag ma rnams kyis ni lcags kyu dang / rna ba'i drung du bkang ba'i mda' dang / mchog sbyin pa'i phyag rgya mdzad pa /

original: g-yon pa'i phyag lhag ma rnams kyis ni zhags pa dang gzhu dang autpala bsnams pa'o //
analyzed: g-yon pa'i phyag lhag ma rnams kyis ni zhags pa dang gzhu dang autpala bsnams pa'o //

original: rgyan thams cad dang ldan pa bsgom par bya ba'o //
analyzed: rgyan thams cad dang ldan pa bsgom par bya ba'o //
translated: One should meditate on her as possessing all the ornaments.

original: shar gyi 'dab ma la rab tu dang ba'i sgrol ma'o //üîΩlho'i 'dab ma la grub pa'i sgrol ma'o //
analyzed: shar gyi 'dab ma la rab tu dang ba'i sgrol ma'o // lho'i 'dab ma la grub pa'i sgrol ma'o //
translated: On the petal in the east, one should meditate on Prasannakirti Tara.üîΩOn the petal in the south, one should meditate on Siddhi Tara.

original: nub kyi 'dab ma la rgyal ba'i sgrol ma'o//üîΩbyang gi 'dab ma la rna ba'i sgrol ma'o //üîΩdbang ldan gyi 'dab ma la tsundra'o //
analyzed: nub kyi 'dab ma la rgyal ba'i sgrol ma'o// byang gi 'dab ma la rna ba'i sgrol ma'o // dbang ldan gyi 'dab ma la tsundra'o //
translated: On the petal in the west, one should meditate on Jay Tara.üîΩOn the petal in the north, one should meditate on Karnikara Tara.

original: me'i 'dab ma la gzhan gyis mi thub pa'o //üîΩbden bral gyi 'dab ma la mar me rab tu gsal bar snang ba'o //
analyzed: me'i 'dab ma la gzhan gyis mi thub pa'o // bden bral gyi 'dab ma la mar me rab tu gsal bar snang ba'o //
translated: On the petal in the northeast, one should meditate on Cundari.üîΩOn the petal in the southeast, one should meditate on Aparajita.

original: rlung gi 'dab ma la sgrol ma dkar mo bsgom par bya ba'o //
analyzed: rlung gi 'dab ma la sgrol ma dkar mo bsgom par bya ba'o //
translated: On the petal in the southwest, one should meditate on Prajnapradlpa Tara.üîΩOn the petal in the northwest, one should meditate on Sitataral.

original: de dag thams cad kyang kha dog dmar mo de bzhin gshegs pa lnga dbu rgyan du gyur pa /
analyzed: de dag thams cad kyang kha dog dmar mo de bzhin gshegs pa lnga dbu rgyan du gyur pa /
translated: All of them are red in color, with the five Tathagatas as head ornaments.

original: rdo rje skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa /
analyzed: rdo rje skyil mo krung gis bzhugs pa /
translated: They sit in the vajra posture.

original: g-yas pa'i phyag dag gis mchog sbyin pa'i phyag rgya dang / rna ba'i bar du bkang ba'i mda' bsnams pa /
analyzed: g-yas pa'i phyag dag gis mchog sbyin pa'i phyag rgya dang / rna ba'i bar du bkang ba'i mda' bsnams pa /
translated: With the right hands they display the boon-granting gesture and hold a bow filled up to the ear.

original: g-yon pa'i phyag gis autpala dang gzhu bsnams pa /
analyzed: g-yon pa'i phyag gis autpala dang gzhu bsnams pa /
translated: With the left hands they hold an utpala and a bow.

original: shar gyi sgor ni rdo rje 'jigs byed ma ste gsus pa 'jol ba zhal rnam par bsgyur ba mdog dmar ba mi bskyod pa dbu rgyan la bzhugs pa /
analyzed: shar gyi sgor ni rdo rje 'jigs byed ma ste gsus pa 'jol ba zhal rnam par bsgyur ba mdog dmar ba mi bskyod pa dbu rgyan la bzhugs pa /
translated: At the eastern gate is Vajra-Bhairava, pot-bellied, with a contorted face, red in color, with Akshobhya as the head ornament.

original: g-yas pa'i phyag gnyis kyis sdigs mdzub dang lcags kyu bsnams pa /
analyzed: g-yas pa'i phyag gnyis kyis sdigs mdzub dang lcags kyu bsnams pa /
translated: With the two right hands he holds up a threatening forefinger and an iron hook.

original: g-yon pa'i phyag gnyis kyis rdo rje'i dril bu dang zhags pa bsnams pa'o //
analyzed: g-yon pa'i phyag gnyis kyis rdo rje'i dril bu dang zhags pa bsnams pa'o //
translated: With the two left hands he holds a vajra bell and a noose.

original: lho sgor ni gzhan gyis mi thub ma ste kha dog ser mo dbu rgyan la rin chen 'byung ldan bzhugs pa /
analyzed: lho sgor ni gzhan gyis mi thub ma ste kha dog ser mo dbu rgyan la rin chen 'byung ldan bzhugs pa /
translated: At the southern gate is Aparajita, yellow in color, with Ratnasambhava as the head ornament.

original: phyag g-yas pa gnyis kyis ni dbyug pa dang lcags kyu bsnams pa /
analyzed: phyag g-yas pa gnyis kyis ni dbyug pa dang lcags kyu bsnams pa /
translated: The two right hands hold a club and a goad.

original: g-yon pa'i phyag gnyis kyis ni dril bu dang zhags pa bsnams pa'o //
analyzed: g-yon pa'i phyag gnyis kyis ni dril bu dang zhags pa bsnams pa'o //

original: nub sgor ni ral gcig ma ste kha dog nag mo skra ni gyen la gsus pa 'phyang ba /
analyzed: nub sgor ni ral gcig ma ste kha dog nag mo skra ni gyen la gsus pa 'phyang ba /
translated: At the western gate is Ekajati, black, with hair standing upward and a pendulous belly.

original: tshems kyis ma mchu kun nas bsdams pa /
analyzed: tshems kyis ma mchu kun nas bsdams pa /
translated: Her teeth are clenched on her lower lip.

original: dbu rgyan la snang ba mtha' yas bzhugs pa /üîΩg-yas kyi phyag gnyis na rdo rje dang lcags kyu bsnams pa /
analyzed: dbu rgyan la snang ba mtha' yas bzhugs pa / g-yas kyi phyag gnyis na rdo rje dang lcags kyu bsnams pa /

original: g-yon gyi phyag gnyis na dril bu dang @219a * //üîΩzhags pa bsnams pa'o //
analyzed: g-yon gyi phyag gnyis na dril bu dang @219a * // zhags pa bsnams pa'o //

original: byang gi sgor ni rdo rje dri za ma ste ser ljang ma don yod grub pa dbu rgyan la bzhugs pa /
analyzed: byang gi sgor ni rdo rje dri za ma ste ser ljang ma don yod grub pa dbu rgyan la bzhugs pa /

original: zhal rnam par bsgyur pa /
analyzed: zhal rnam par bsgyur pa /

original: gsus pa 'jol ba /
analyzed: gsus pa 'jol ba /

analyzed: phyag g-yas pa gnyis kyis ni kha tv'am ga dang lcags kyu bsnams pa /

analyzed: bzhi po de dag rnams ni g-yon bskum pa'i zhabs kyis bzhugs pa'o //

original: de la khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya ni 'di yin te /
analyzed: de la khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya ni 'di yin te /
translated: The mudrƒÅ of Trilokavijaya is as follows:

analyzed: lag pa gnyis kyi rgyab gnyis sprad la srin lag gnyis mdud pa byas shing mthe'u chung gnyis dang gung mo gnyis kyis kun nas dkris te /

analyzed: mdzub mo gnyis lcags kyu'i rnam pa ltar byas pa 'gying ba dang ldan pas dpral ba'i phyogs su gzung bar bya ba'o //

original: bsgoms pas dub na sngags bzlas par bya ste /
analyzed: bsgoms pas dub na sngags bzlas par bya ste /

analyzed: aom ku ru kulle hr'i: sv'a h'a / khri bzlas pas skye bo thams cad dbang du 'gyur ro //

original: khri phrag gis ni bka' blon pa'o //
analyzed: khri phrag gis ni bka' blon pa'o //
translated: By reciting it ten thousand times, all beings will be under one‚Äôs control.üîΩBy reciting it a hundred thousand times, one will be able to give orders.

analyzed: autpala dang mar dang sbrang rtsis byugs pa'i shing aa shvadtha dang yam shing rnams kyis sbyin sreg byas na 'dod pa'i go 'phang thob par 'gyur ro //
